name: cockcrow
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] the time in the morning when light begins to appear and the cock (= a male chicken) crows (= makes a sound): I awoke before cockcrow. Synonym
dawn
[ C ] the sound of a cock (= a male chicken) crowing (= making a sound): I heard a cockcrow.
More examplesFewer examplesShe kept him talking until cockcrow.We rise at cockcrow.She works from cockcrow until dusk.The priests drag me out of bed at the first cockcrow.What did that cockcrow mean?
